channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Everything is Trending Nicely (But Don’t Wait)
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! I look at today's chart as a market breadth scorecard—tracking how many stocks sit above key moving averages. Short and medium-...

item.title: Actual Data vs. Recession Fears
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Analysts just trimmed S&P 500 earnings estimates by 2.4% for Q2—more than usual, but not exactly doomsday stuff. We’re in the m...

item.title: Classic Bullish Pattern Forming
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! I’m seeing a textbook bull flag forming on the Nasdaq—and it’s showing up on the S&P 500 and other indexes too. If this pattern...

item.title: Another Bullish Divergence
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Even though the major indexes are still off their highs, something interesting is happening beneath the surface. The Advance-De...

item.title: This Doesn’t Happen in a Recession
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Stocks finally broke their 9-day win streak yesterday—and while that might seem like a setback, history tells a different story...
